title: Core Notes
description: Schema for the core:notes component. An object with a single 'notes' array, where each note has exactly two fields: 'text' (non-empty string) and 'timestamp' (ISO 8601 date-time). No extra properties are allowed at any level.

text.description: The note content; must be a non-empty string.

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 date-time string representing when the note was created.
